definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: How do phonetics and phonology differ in their focus of study?
sentences.chinese: 語音學和音位學的研究重心有何不同？

sentences.english: He is a great authority on phonetics.
sentences.chinese: 他是語音學方面的權威。

sentences.english: Trask, A Dictionary of Phonetics and Phonology.
sentences.chinese: 語音學和音系學詞典，譯文出版社。

sentences.english: R. L. Trask, A Dictionary of Phonetics and Phonology.
sentences.chinese: 語音學和音系學詞典，譯文出版社。

sentences.english: What are the three branches of phonetics? How do they contribute to the study of speech sounds?
sentences.chinese: 語音學的三個分支是什麼。它們是如何研究語言學的？

sentences.english: Did you pass your phonetics exam?
There were some substitutive sounds of the pronunciation positio…
sentences.chinese: 結論傳統語音學是齶裂語音研究的基礎。

sentences.english: Phonetics is a required subject in our department.
sentences.chinese: 語音學是我們系的一門必修課。

sentences.english: Linguistics embraces a diverse range of subjects such as phonetics and stylistics.
sentences.chinese: 語言學包括許多不同的科目，如語音學和文體學。

definition: colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character
to give classes/to work as a teacher
calculus/differentiation and integration/calculus of infinitesimals 微 and integrals 積|积
to notate music/to write a score
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
lit. doesn't (even) enter a single aperture (of one's head)/I don't understand a word (idiom)/it's all Greek to me
secondary normal school (abbr. for 中等師範學校|中等师范学校[zhong1 deng3 shi1 fan4 xue2 xiao4])
Liu Shipei (1884-1919), Chinese anarchist and revolutionary activist
